system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.ScZmtSWFJTU4dg9v]{Brawl}

Benefits

Once per round, if the character makes a successful melee attack with an unarmed strike or a small or smaller weapon (including size decreases from equipment, but not from feats or racial traits) the character deals an extra 2 damage dice of damage. This damage dice is the same size and type as the one used for the weapon used. The size of the weapon is determined by the absolute size of the weapon including itâ€™s upgrades, and does not benefit from feats or racial abilities that may reduce or increase weapon size.
system.summary: Deal bonus damage once per round with small weapons or unarmed
